name: rghaif
ingredients: Dough similar to msemen (Flour T45, extra fine semolina, lukewarm water, yeast, salt)
Mixture of melted butter and neutral oil (for layering)
Filling of your choice (savory: onions, tomatoes, peppers / sweet: almonds, honey)
steps: Prepare the dough: mix the flour, semolina, yeast, and salt. Knead with lukewarm water to obtain a soft and elastic dough. Form balls and let rest.
For shaping: Roll out each ball very thinly. Brush with the butter/oil mixture and fold into a square or roll for maximum layering.
For baked Rghaif (or crispy pastries): Slightly flatten the squares.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200Â°C for 20 to 25 minutes, until golden and flaky.
Serve hot, plain or stuffed (if stuffed, the filling is added during folding).
